description: Introduction to Persian (Farsi) and Persian-speaking culture with practice in all four language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Intended for students with no previous study of Persian as well as heritage speakers.
fulldesc:
PERS 1 First-Year Persian
Introduction to Persian (Farsi) and Persian-speaking culture with practice in all four language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Intended for students with no previous study of Persian as well as heritage speakers.
Credits 5
Instructor The Staff
Quarter Offered Fall
